thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 9 of 122
thread.title: Duncan Smith

author: Duncan Smith
title: Duncan Smith
text:
I have used this company many times, and always with "Ross". The service has always been thorough and speedy. There have been only one or two. minor problems, which once pointed out, have been resolved to my complete satisfaction.
I will speak to Ross again later this year to organise the flights, car hire and accommodation for my trip.
I have no hesitation in recommending Dial-a-Flight.
